text: Anarsia stepposella is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It was described by Ponomarenko in 2002. It is found in Russia (Tuva) and north-western Kazakhstan.Anarsia at funet The wingspan is 14.5–15 mm. The forewings are light-grey, with the dorsal half darker than the costal half. The costal margin is dark-brown from the base to one-fourth and there are nine dark-brown streaks from the base to the apex. The hindwings are grey.Far East. Ent. 115: 2 ==References== stepposella Category:Moths described in 2002 Category:Moths of Asia
title: Anarsia stepposella
